snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Tuesday’s selections include a survey that says staying overnight with Airbnb is cheaper than getting a hotel room, and slow streaming for...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Tuesday’s selections include a survey that says staying overnight with Airbnb is cheaper than getting a hotel room, and slow streaming for Netflix movies on Verizon Internet connections.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Airbnb Economy, and Netflix-Verizon Slowdown
